title: HOLY crap.
body: Anyone else experiences problems with logging in? when i open up my client i get hit with the "Unable to connect to authentication service...etc" that's just BS because my buddies and them are playing the game with zero issues...like i hate when this happens . Please fix this issue.

replies.body: The servers don't seem to have had any widespread issues today, but it sounds like your network just isn't able to get a solid connection with our servers for some reason. Try updating your port forwarding and dns settings first, which if you're not sure how to do those steps you can find help in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
